title: 03/09/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/09/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the boys break down the Dak Prescott extension. Dallas Morning News reporter Tim Cowlishaw joined Dan in the first hour to discuss the signing and the next step for America’s Team. NBA Hall-of- Famer Julius Erving hopped on the program in the second hour to catch up with DP and talk about the next generation of dunkers. Moving back to football, ESPN’s Dan Orlovsky sat down with Dan and to further evaluate the Prescott signing and how he can come back following a season derailed by a broken ankle. And Darren Rovell joined the show in the final hour to discuss the phenomena that is trading cards and now trading NBA highlights through a new “NBA Top Shot” website.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the boys break down the Dak Prescott extension. Dallas Morning News reporter Tim Cowlishaw joined Dan in the first hour to discuss the signing and the next step for America’s Team. NBA Hall-of- Famer Julius Erving hopped on the program in the second hour to catch up with DP and talk about the next generation of dunkers. Moving back to football, ESPN’s Dan Orlovsky sat down with Dan and to further evaluate the Prescott signing and how he can come back following a season derailed by a broken ankle. And Darren Rovell joined the show in the final hour to discuss the phenomena that is trading cards and now trading NBA highlights through a new “NBA Top Shot” website.
